question.saved: Question with RDC-ID {{ id }} was saved successfully!
question.not-saved: Question with RDC-ID {{ id }} has not been saved!
question.missing-id: Question {{ index }} does not contain a RDC-ID and has not been saved!
question.upload-terminated: Finished upload of {{ total }} Questions with {{ errors }} errors.

question.valid-question-id-name: The RDC-ID must start with the project ID (e.g. projectID-variableName) and must be equal to variable ID!
question.unique-question-name: The name of a question has to be unique within a instrument.

id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of an Atomic Question must not be empty!
id.size: The max length of the RDC-ID is 128 signs.
id.pattern: Use only alphanumeric signs, german umlauts, ÃŸ, space, underscore and minus for the RDC-ID.

number.not-empty: The number of the Question must not be empty.
number.size: The max length of the number of the question is 32 signs.

question-text.not-null: The question text of the question must not be empty.
question-text.i18n-string-size: The max length of the question text is 2048 signs.

instruction.i18n-string-size: The max length of the instruction is 2048 signs.

introduction.i18n-string-size: The max length of the introduction is 2048 signs.

type.not-null: The type of the question must not be empty.
type.valid-question-type: The type of the question has an invalid value or is inconsistent between the languages.

additional-question-text.i18n-string-size: The max length of the additional question text is 1048576 signs.

image-type.not-null: The image type of the question must not be empty.
image-type.valid-question-image-type: The image type of a question must be PNG.

technical-representation.size: The max length of the technical representation is 1048576 signs.

instrument-id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of the Instrument must not be empty!

survey-id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of the Survey must not be empty!

post-validation.question-has-invalid-variable-id: The Question {{id}} references to an unknown Variable ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
post-validation.question-has-invalid-instrument-id: The Question {{id}} references to an unknown Instrument ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
post-validation.question-has-invalid-survey-id: The Question {{id}} references to an unknown Survey ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
